'''2.2.2806''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.2804''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.2803''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 25, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Fixed build breaks on Unix-like systems.
* Fixed an issues with Windows not logging 'proper looking' paths in logs.
* Various fixes on MacOS builds to improve reliability.
* Updated bootstrapper to remove dependency on <code>vcruntime140.dll</code>.
* Added additional logging to catch CDN problems.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-17433}} - First three columns of launcher log are displayed darker than they were previously.
* {{Bug|MCL-17472}} - Several search fields in the launcher are not selected when clicking on the search icon.
* {{Bug|MCL-17281}} - Launcher won't load.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* The changelog of this version is same with the 2.2.27''xx'''s, only additionally fixed 1 bug.
* Changelog of 2.2.27''xx'' disappeared when this version released.
